about.title: Get to know me!
about.firstParagraph: I'm a skilled Frontend Developer with a master's degree in biomedical engineering, experienced in creating intuitive interfaces and various applications, including healthcare systems, facebook fanpage management platform and more.
about.secondParagraph: I'm proficient in <0><1>React.js</0> & <2><3>Next.js</2>, and also have strong background in software development, quality assurance, and project management.
about.thirdParagraph: I believe I'm a quick learner, team player, and excellent communicator, who passionate about crafting elegant, functional designs to improve user experience.
